title: P7 How do I export contacts to another phone using a SIM card
answer:
Go to the contacts list, touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=35551)> **Import/Export **> **Export to SIM card**, and follow the onscreen instructions to export contacts from your phone to the SIM card. 


 Then insert the SIM card into another phone, and import the contacts to that phone.
